RangeIn.description: Distance from object before it spawns

RangeOut.description: Distance from object before it despawns

Speed.description: Movement speed of the Shy Guy.

MaxMoveDistance.description: Maximum movement distance of the Shy Guy (Infinite if -1).

IsEventDriven.description: Is movement turned on by event.

Direction.description: Direction of the Shy Guy. (0 = Left | 1 = Right).

DepthOffset.description: Depth offset of the Shy Guy.
